Recover selected items from the trash
From this window it is possible to proceed with the creation of one or more folders: only folders with valid names will be created.
if the option is active the created folders will be visible only to the creator and the administrators.
if the option is active, the addition of files/folders/links to users who can access them will be allowed.
Create one or more folders with the names shown in the relevant fields.
Close the window and cancel the operation

From this window it is possible to proceed with the creation of one or more links: for each link it is possible to indicate the internet address and a name to be displayed. The system will ONLY create links with an address.
if the option is active, the links created will only be visible to the creator and the administrators.
Create one or more links with the data indicated in the relevant fields.
Close window and cancel the operation
Add one or more files to the folder

From this window it is possible to load one or more files: for ALL files it is possible to set the visibility (IF the relative item is selected ALL the uploaded files will be HID) and any type (normal, SCORM, etc.).
From this window it is possible to load one or more files: it is possible to hide the uploaded files, IF the relevant item is selected ALL the uploaded files will be HIDDEN.
if the option is active, the files created will only be visible to the creator and the administrators.
WARNING: the type of file you choose will be associated with ALL the files you want to upload.

Save the settings for completing the SCORM package
You do not have permission to change the SCORM package settings

On this page you can define how to complete the SCORM package. The underlying tree represents the logical structure of the package, you can let the package itself provide information about its completion / overrun or customize the completion settings at the package or individual activity level. When saving, the new settings will be applied to all the plays in progress or later.
Settings related to the completion of the SCORM package
Select the default completion mode for this SCORM package.
Customized at the level of individual activities
